doGet

public void doGet(HttpServletRequest p_Request,
                  HttpServletResponse p_Response)
           throws ServletException,
                  java.io.IOException
Respond to an HTTP Request by passing an Interaction object to the proxy agent using the object2agent channel and waiting for the signal that the Response of the Interaction was updated.

Parameters:
p_Request - incoming HTTP request.
p_Response - outgoing HTTP Response.
